#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{	
		int t;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--)
        {
            int a;
            cin>>a;
            if(a%2!=0)
            {
                cout<<"BOB"<<endl;
            }
            else
            {
                cout<<"ALICE"<<endl;
            }
        }
            
	return 0;
}
